com.pos.device.magcard

Class MagCardReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pos.device.magcard.MagCardReader

  • public final class MagCardReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The class describes the operators of magnetic card reader.

    Created by NP-JAY on 2016/9/23.
